title: Advertising & Provider Info | %%BRAND_NAME%%
description: Advertising options, disclosures, and how providers can request updates.
main_html:
Advertise on The Industry Guides

Enterprise-grade inventory. Deterministic enforcement. No guesswork.

Buyout tiers (locked inventory)

Tier 1 — Guide Spotlight

$2,500 / month

  • Locks a single guide page
  • 2 placements on that guide
  • No impact on city/state/vertical inventory

Tier 2 — City Buyout

$12,500 / month

  • Locks a single city page
  • 3 placements on that city page
  • Includes the city’s “featured examples” surface

Tier 3 — State Buyout (PI only)

$25,000 / month

  • PI pack only
  • Locks the state hub page + PI state directory surface
  • State pages count toward inventory totals

Tier 4 — Vertical Pack Buyout

$75,000 / month

  • Top-tier exclusivity for an entire vertical pack
  • City pages (all placements), guide pages (all placements), hub hero, and PI state pages (PI pack only)
  • Supports deferred exclusivity when lower-tier contracts exist

Inventory is enforced by validators and sponsor-apply logic. If a placement would violate an active contract, the build hard-fails.

What slots look like (visual)

These wireframes show the exact ad surfaces by scope. This is the same map used by our validators.

Guide page (2 placements)

┌─────────────────────────────── GUIDE PAGE ────────────────────────────────┐
│ Hero + Title                                                              │
│ [Placement A — Sponsor Banner]                                            │
│ ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── │
│ If you only read one thing (callout)                                      │
│ Section blocks (cards)                                                    │
│ Section blocks (cards)                                                    │
│ [Placement B — Sponsor CTA]                                               │
│ Footer disclosure                                                         │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

City page (3 placements)

┌──────────────────────────────── CITY PAGE ────────────────────────────────┐
│ City hero                                                                 │
│ [Placement 1 — Top]                                                       │
│ ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── │
│ Eval framework / “Start here” blocks                                      │
│ …                                                                         │
│ LLM question (directly above providers/listings)                           │
│ Providers / Listings block                                                 │
│ [Placement 2 — Mid]                                                       │
│ FAQ + Guides preview                                                       │
│ [Placement 3 — Bottom]                                                     │
│ Footer disclosure                                                          │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

PI state page (PI-only)

┌────────────────────────────── PI STATE PAGE ──────────────────────────────┐
│ State hero                                                                 │
│ State sponsor surface (PI-only)                                            │
│ Directory / disciplinary links / methodology blocks                         │
│ Footer disclosure                                                          │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Vertical Pack Buyout coverage ($75K)

┌────────────────────────────── VERTICAL PACK ──────────────────────────────┐
│ Hub hero + pack-wide call-to-action                                        │
│ City pages: 3 placements each (ALL count)                                  │
│ Guide pages: 2 placements each (ALL count)                                 │
│ PI state pages: included (PI pack only)                                    │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Total placements calculation

Total = (cityPages × 3) + (guidePages × 2) + (statePages × stateSurfaceCount) + hubHeroCount

Start a sponsorship inquiry

If you have a target city/state/guide or want to discuss a vertical pack buyout, use the inquiry button below.

Start inquiry
